Class SLConfigurableExtension<T extends ConfigurableExtensionRuntime<? extends V>,V extends ExtensionConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jame.core.extension.sl.SLExtension<T>
      • net.sf.jame.core.extension.sl.SLConfigurableExtension<T,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the extension runtime type.
    V - the extension configuration type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurableExtension<T,V>, Extension<T>

    public class SLConfigurableExtension<T extends ConfigurableExtensionRuntime<? extends V>,V extends ExtensionConfig>
extends SLExtension<T>
implements ConfigurableExtension<T,V>
    SL configurable extension.

    Andrea Medeghini
